text:
@SpeakerPelosi You werr telling your constituants to party! How did you not get COVID19 while out with them? Do you have an immunity you're not sharing with us? You and schumer both were mingling amongst the populace yet no COVID.....hmmmm 
You stood up and called Potus xenophobic when he did.
